personal.about: I'm Vardan Verma — a full-stack engineer with an M.Tech in Software Engineering from BITS Pilani. I specialize in backend architecture, cloud infrastructure, and practical AI integration. I build primarily with Python, Django, Node.js, and FastAPI, treating every project with a DevOps-first mindset: containerized from day one, version-controlled, and shipped through automated CI/CD pipelines on AWS and GCP. Beyond writing code, I actively deploy LLMs, RAG pipelines, and multi-step AI agents into real production workflows. I also consult, teach, and collaborate — I believe the best engineers invest in the people around them as much as the systems they build.

pipeline.title: Local Dev
pipeline.description: Feature branches created locally. Code written, tested manually, and linted before pushing. Pre-commit hooks enforce formatting standards.

pipeline.title: Code Push
pipeline.description: Code pushed to GitHub. Branch protection rules require peer review before any merge to main. Pull request templates guide consistent descriptions.

pipeline.title: CI Trigger
pipeline.description: GitHub Actions workflow fires automatically on push or PR events. Environment variables are injected securely from GitHub Secrets.

pipeline.title: Build & Test
pipeline.description: Unit tests, integration tests, and linting run in parallel. Security scanning via Trivy. Any failure immediately blocks the pipeline.

pipeline.title: Docker Image
pipeline.description: Multi-stage Docker build produces a lean production image, pushed to Amazon ECR with semantic version tags and SHA digests.

pipeline.title: Cloud Deploy
pipeline.description: Rolling update deployed to AWS ECS or GCP Cloud Run. Zero-downtime switchover with automatic rollback on health check failure.

pipeline.title: Direct Hosting
pipeline.description: For web and client projects: deployed directly to VPS via SSH or cPanel. Nginx reverse proxy configured, SSL via Let's Encrypt, PM2 for process management.

pipeline.title: Monitor & Alert
pipeline.description: CloudWatch dashboards track latency, error rates, and resource utilisation. Uptime Robot monitors public endpoints. Slack alerts fire on anomalies.

ai.summary: I don't just talk about AI — I ship it. From production RAG pipelines and LangChain-powered APIs to multi-step agents that replace entire manual workflows, AI is baked into how I build. It's an engineering discipline, not a demo.
useCases: Built a RAG-powered internal knowledge bot using LangChain + Pinecone, reducing L1 support queries by 40% within the first month of deployment.
Engineered a document intelligence pipeline using GPT-4o that classifies, extracts, and summarizes content from PDFs at scale — handling 10k+ documents per day.
Deployed autonomous AI agents that orchestrate end-to-end workflows: data ingestion → transformation → enrichment → Slack/email notification, eliminating ~12 hours of manual work per week.
Implemented context-aware chatbots with conversation memory and multi-tenant isolation, deployed behind a REST API with JWT auth and rate limiting.

projects.name: CloudOps Automation Suite
projects.description: A full-stack DevOps dashboard that provisions and tears down AWS infrastructure via Terraform, tracks real-time service health through CloudWatch, and triggers auto-scaling rules based on custom metric thresholds. Includes a cost analytics view and Slack alerting.

projects.name: AI Document Intelligence
projects.description: A scalable document processing API that uses GPT-4o to extract structured data, classify document types, and generate summaries from uploaded PDFs and images. Deployed serverlessly on AWS Lambda with S3-backed storage and async job queuing.

projects.name: RAG Knowledge Base API
projects.description: A production-ready Retrieval-Augmented Generation system with semantic vector search via Pinecone, sliding-window conversation memory, and full multi-tenant isolation. Exposed via a REST API secured with JWT, rate limiting, and per-tenant token tracking.

projects.name: E-Commerce Microservices Platform
projects.description: Modular e-commerce backend split across independent microservices for auth, product inventory, order management, and payment processing. Each service owns its own database, communicates via REST, and is independently deployable through GitHub Actions onto AWS ECS with Redis-backed session caching.

projects.name: GymCRM — Gym Management System
projects.description: Currently building a full-featured CRM tailored for gym businesses. Covers member onboarding, subscription & plan management, attendance tracking, trainer assignment, and revenue reporting — all through a clean Django admin and a custom REST API for future mobile integration.

projects.name: Corporate Web Platform
projects.description: A full-stack business website and client portal built for a mid-sized consulting firm. Includes a public-facing marketing site, a secure client login area, project status tracking, document sharing, and an admin CMS — all deployed on a managed VPS with Nginx and automated SSL renewal.

projects.name: TallySync — ERP Integration Layer
projects.description: A middleware ERP platform that bridges Tally accounting data with a custom Django web dashboard. Enables real-time inventory tracking, purchase order management, vendor ledger views, and automated GST report generation — eliminating manual data entry across finance and operations teams.
